author: Sarita Thayil
title: UW Libraries December Update 2024
text:
Winter is upon us and the end of fall quarter is here! We hope that UW Libraries has been a part of your positive 2024 Husky experience. A sincere THANK YOU to all who consider supporting UW Libraries in your annual philanthropy. Your gift supports every student and a global community of teaching, learning and research; read our feature stories this month for some inspiring examples! Speaking of giving, grab the perfect UW gift from UW Press‚Äô 40% off Holiday Sale. Whether you are going home, taking a trip or staying on campus, enjoy your break in whatever form it takes, and take advantage of free access to streaming media, games and more (see below for more details!). Stay connected with us in 2025 for an exciting winter quarter of fun events, learning opportunities, exhibits and more.
Hours Reminder: *Know before you go--be aware of adjustments to hours for end-of-quarter and interim/break.
UW Press publishes unique and compelling work (both fiction and non-fiction) with regional, national and global impact. With a wide range of topics, you‚Äôll find something for everyone on your list. Take advantage of this special holiday savings today and give a gift that is uniquely ‚ÄúUW‚Äù for the holidays, that next birthday, or ‚Äújust because‚Äù. Now through January 3, 2025, use the promo code WINTER24 at checkout to receive 40% off your purchase and free domestic shipping. Happy holidays, and thank you for supporting the University of Washington Press. To order and learn more, browse their site .
News and Stories UW Libraries‚Äô Elliot Stevens listens to the podcast project from one of the UW Libraries High School Internship participants. UW Magazine Feature Story : UW Libraries‚Äô internship program gives high school students an idea of what it looks like to attend the University of Washington, especially if they don‚Äôt have family experience to lean on.
Libraries in the Classroom: International Edition ‚Äì Take a trip to the gorgeous country of Slovenia with UW Libraries‚Äô Michael Biggins for an inside look at the new study abroad program Slovenia: Language, Culture and Society at a Crossroads .
UW Libraries‚Äô Michael Biggins with UW students on a walking tour of Ljubljana (Slovenia‚Äôs capital)
A Legacy of Equality and Leadership Organizing, announcing new LELO collection : The Northwest Labor and Employment Law Office (LELO) emerged in 1972 from a coalition of Black, Asian American, and Latinx labor organizations, LELO made significant strides for workers‚Äô rights, including increasing Black employment in construction trades and securing union organizers‚Äô access to migrant workers. Now, an extensive collection of organizational records from 1972 to 2005 including audiovisual materials, publications, and artifacts documenting decades of LELO‚Äôs advocacy and campaigns are available to explore through the UW Harry Bridges Center for Labor Studies and the Labor Archives of Washington.
UW Tacoma Library Spotlight ‚Äì More Choices for Textbooks : This blog post from UW Tacoma Library explores how student feedback is helping to guide operational decisions to improve student access and use of course materials like a textbook-swap pilot, and extended course reserve check-out times.
For Faculty ‚Äì UW Libraries 2024/2025 Subscription Review Update : Per the most recent presentation at the Faculty Council on University Libraries, please read this important summary on the timing and status of subscription reviews including feedback processes for proposed cancellations and deadlines.
Break Time Boredom Busters Have some downtime during the academic break and not sure what to do? Explore these FREE entertaining Libraries resources!
Streaming Media : From foreign films, documentaries, musical and dance performances, public broadcasting archives and more, there are thousands of online videos to explore that you won‚Äôt find on your typical streaming services. The Game Collection at Odegaard Library contains board, card, and tabletop role-playing games (TTRPGs). The collection is located on Odegaard's 1st floor, just inside and to the left of the main entry doors. Good Reads is a collection of fiction and nonfiction books for students to read for leisure. All the books in the Good Reads collection have been published within the last five years, so find your new favorite book here! Digital Collections : From old UW yearbooks and campus photos, vintage ephemera like postcards, menus, magazines, posters, rare books, manuscripts, maps and so much more to spend a few hours (or a few days) going down the ‚Äúrabbit hole‚Äù of wonder and delight that is UW Libraries Special Collections ‚Äì and UW Libraries ethnomusicology collections ! Community/Events/Exhibits Coming Soon! NEW EXHIBIT: Celebrating The Rocket, Seattle‚Äôs Music Magazine (Monday, Jan 6 ‚Äì Saturday, Feb 15, 2025): Explore 20 years of music and culture as told through the pages of ‚ÄúThe Rocket,‚Äù the influential Seattle publication that covered music venues and regional bands including Riot Grrrl, Mudhoney, Nirvana, Sir-Mix-A-Lot, Sleeter-Kinney, and Soundgarden during the 1980s and 1990s. This exhibit will also celebrate the Rocket‚Äôs late, long-time editor and publisher Charles Cross, by presenting its covers and coverage of the music industry and local culture. The exhibit highlights how the UW Libraries and the Washington State Library preserve and make it accessible to all.
Exploring East Asia‚Äôs Cultural Heritage Through Illustrated Works (Tateuchi EAL Reading Room, 2024 Fall ‚Äì 2025 Winter)
The Language of Flowers Exhibit: Enjoy the changing seasons with Special Collections through our annual lobby exhibit, The Language of Flowers. Each quarter will feature new material related to our botanical collections, local plants, and more.
Zeitgeist: Seattle in the ‚Äò20s Exhibit: In this exhibit, Special Collections explores popular culture and current events of Seattle in the 1920s and the 2020s!
Learning Workshops and Office Hours
Intermediate Data Science Office Hours : December 12: Come talk to the eScience Institute‚Äôs Technical Education Specialist to get some human help about how to advance your computational work. Tools we can help with include Python, R, OpenRefine, Git and UNIX shells, among others.
Visit UW Libraries Blog site to read more posts from their archive.

author: Willy Rovelli
title: Apprendre les gestes de premiers secours - France Bleu
text: Apprendre les gestes de premiers secours - France Bleu On parle √©galement de voyage ! De voyage avec les meilleurs activit√©s adapt√©es pour les personnes √† mobilit√© r√©duite. On vous explique tout avec Willy, Nicolas et Robin ! Sauvez des vies ! Lionel Ventura, auteur du livre "Ma trousse de secours" chez Flammarion, propose un guide pratique pour apprendre √† r√©agir efficacement face √† des situations de d√©tresse vitale. Gr√¢ce √† une combinaison de techniques d'acupression et de gestes de premiers secours, il offre une approche pour aider √† r√©gir rapidement en cas d'urgence. Cette m√©thode ancienne mais toujours efficace, l'acupression, peut soulager divers maux courants comme : le nez bouch√©, la sinusite ou encore les douleurs abdominales. En France, la sensibilisation aux gestes de premiers secours, avec l‚ÄôAttestation de Premiers Secours (APS), reste insuffisante. Lionel Ventura souligne la n√©cessit√© d'une mise √† jour annuelle des comp√©tences pour toutes et tous d√®s l'√©cole primaire. Un guide de tourisme inclusif Lucie Fontaine a con√ßu et √©dit√© "Vacances accessibles en France" publi√© par Michelin √âditions, qui est un guide indispensable pour les personnes √† mobilit√© r√©duite souhaitant voyage sans se heurter aux obstacles de l'inaccessibilit√©. Il offre une multitude de possibilit√©s pour des vacances sereines. Le guide recense 1200 activit√©s offrant divers niveaux d'accessibilit√©. Les lieux mentionn√©s sont class√©s selon leur accessibilit√©, allant de ceux qui sont 100 % accessibles et labellis√©s "Tourisme et Handicap", √† ceux qui le sont moins. Dans les chroniques de la tribu - Nicolas Malaboeuf - Robin Bernaud

author: Brooksentgl Pages
title: Effective and Trusted: Majestic Handyman for Your Tasks
text:
The Advantages of Professional Handyman Services for Home Repairs
In today's hectic globe, home owners are frequently encountered with a wide range of repair tasks that need to be resolved. Not every person possesses the necessary skills or time to take on these tasks themselves. This is where professional handyman solutions can show to be very useful. By hiring an expert handyman, property owners can take advantage of their expertise, saving both time and effort at the same time. These professionals are well-versed in a vast array of fixing jobs, ensuring that no task is also big or tiny. Deciding for specialist services uses a cost-efficient choice to DIY repair services, as it eliminates the danger of pricey blunders. With a guarantee of top quality handiwork and dependable outcomes, house owners can enjoy the benefit and peace of mind that includes delegating their home repairs to the hands of experienced professionals.
Time-Saving Solutions for Home Fixes
One of the crucial advantages of employing specialist handyman solutions for home repair services is the ability to access efficient and time-saving options. Time is usually of the significance when it comes to home repair services. Whether it's a leaky faucet, a damaged window, or a malfunctioning electric system, these problems can interfere with the daily performance of a home. By enlisting the aid of an expert handyman solution, house owners can feel confident that their repair services will be finished in a prompt way.
Specialist handymen have the necessary skills, experience, and devices to successfully deal with a large range of home repair work jobs. They are well-versed in repairing common house issues and can swiftly identify the origin cause of the issue. This enables them to apply reliable options without squandering time on trial and error.
Moreover, expert handymen have accessibility to a network of vendors and vendors, which allows them to resource premium products at affordable prices. This not just conserves time yet also guarantees that the repairs are done making use of resilient and reliable products.
Additionally, professional handymen frequently operate in groups or have a network of relied on specialists they can contact for aid. This allows them to split and dominate intricate repair tasks, further reducing the time called for to complete the task.
Competence in Managing a Large Range of Repair Service Projects
Expert handymen have a varied skill set and knowledge in managing numerous sorts of repair service projects. Whether it's a leaking faucet, a damaged electric socket, or a harmed drywall, these experts have the understanding and experience to deal with a large range of repair tasks. Their proficiency allows them to effectively resolve the root and detect reason for the problem, making sure that the repair work are done appropriately and effectively.
Among the advantages of working with an expert handyman is their capability to manage several sorts of repair work. They have the essential skills to deal with numerous systems and elements of a home, consisting of plumbing, electric, carpentry, and a lot more. This convenience makes them a valuable source for homeowners who require assistance with various fixing projects.
Furthermore, expert handymen stay updated with the most recent devices, strategies, and laws in the market. They undergo constant training to improve their understanding and skills, enabling them to give high-quality repair service services. Their proficiency permits them to work successfully and safely, decreasing the danger of further damages or accidents throughout the repair procedure.
Cost-Effective Alternative to Do It Yourself Repair Works
Firstly, expert handymen have the essential skills and competence to manage a large range of repair projects. They have the expertise and experience to promptly assess the issue and supply a service that is both effective and reliable. This indicates that the fixing will certainly be done appropriately the very first time, conserving homeowners from the pricey blunders and prospective damages that can happen with DIY fixings.
In addition, professional handymen have access to the right tools and devices needed to complete the repairs. By hiring a handyman, homeowners can prevent the expenditure of renting or buying specialized devices that might only be required for one task. This can substantially lower the general price of the fixing.
Assurance of High Quality Handiwork and Reliable Outcomes
With their experience and interest to detail, expert handymen ensure that property owners get top quality workmanship and reliable outcomes for their home repair services. When it comes to taking on home fixings, it is essential to believe in the job being done. Specialist handymen supply a guarantee of top quality craftsmanship, supplying homeowners with assurance that the repair services will be finished to a high standard.
Among the crucial advantages of hiring a professional handyman is their experience and knowledge in managing numerous home repair work jobs. These specialists have actually gone through training and have a deep understanding of different repair service strategies, making sure that the work is done correctly and successfully. They possess the needed tools and equipment, enabling them to complete the repairs with accuracy and precision.
Moreover, professional handymen have a keen eye for
read heredetail. They are meticulous in their job and pay attention to also the tiniest of details to make certain that the repair services are carried out faultlessly. This interest to detail lead to trusted and lasting fixing services, conserving homeowners from the trouble and hassle of regular repairs.
Benefit and Comfort for Homeowners
Homeowners can appreciate convenience and assurance when working with professional handyman solutions for their home repairs. Handling home repairs can be a taxing and difficult job, specifically for people with hectic timetables or minimal DIY abilities - Majestic Handyman. By employing a specialist handyman, property owners can conserve important time and power that can be better made use of for other important jobs or tasks
One of the primary conveniences of working with a specialist handyman is the capability to have several fixings and upkeep tasks completed in one visit. Rather than contacting various service providers for each specific repair work, homeowners can rely upon a handyman who is experienced in various areas. This removes the hassle of scheduling multiple visits and collaborating different service providers for different tasks.
In addition, professional handymen have the knowledge and experience to deal with a large range of home repair services, from simple solutions to more complicated jobs (Majestic Handyman). They have the needed devices and knowledge to efficiently and efficiently complete the repair work, making certain high-grade handiwork and reputable results
Furthermore, specialist handymen frequently offer guarantees or guarantees for their services, offering
view ithome owners peace of mind. Knowing that the repair services are backed by an assurance can minimize any kind of concerns or stress over the quality of job and prospective issues that might develop in the future.
Verdict
They offer time-saving remedies for home repairs and have knowledge in handling a large range of repair work tasks. Additionally, they supply an economical alternative to DIY repairs and assure quality handiwork and trusted results.

author: Dan Marzullo
title: I built a successful business and I hate it. What should I do? - Indie Hackers
text: I‚Äôm a few years into running a business I built from the ground up, but here‚Äôs the kicker‚ÄîI hate it. When I started this journey, I was all in. I left a stable corporate job to pursue what I thought was my passion, poured everything I had into making this business successful, and for a while, it worked. I was proud of what I created, and it felt like I was doing something meaningful. But now, every day feels like a grind, and I can‚Äôt shake the feeling that I‚Äôm trapped in a cage of my own making. It‚Äôs not just the long hours or the stress of running a business‚Äîthough those are definitely part of it. It‚Äôs the fact that I‚Äôve lost all connection to why I started this in the first place. The industry has changed, and so have I. The things that used to excite me now feel like chores, and the thought of continuing down this path for another year, let alone another decade, makes me want to scream. My family and friends see me as this successful entrepreneur, living the dream, and they don‚Äôt understand why I‚Äôm so unhappy. My employees rely on me, and I feel a huge sense of responsibility toward them. The business is profitable, and I‚Äôm making more money than I ever did in my old job, but what‚Äôs the point if I‚Äôm miserable every single day? I‚Äôve thought about selling the business, but the idea of walking away feels like admitting defeat. What if I never find something I‚Äôm passionate about again? What if I regret giving up everything I‚Äôve built? On the flip side, the thought of sticking it out and pretending to care for the sake of everyone else feels like I‚Äôm signing up for a slow death by boredom and burnout. So, what should I do? Should I sell the business, shut it down, or suck it up and keep going? Am I just going through a rough patch, or is it time to admit that I‚Äôve fallen out of love with my own creation? ‚ÄîShaun B. Let me start by saying this: You‚Äôre not alone. There‚Äôs a dirty little secret that successful entrepreneurs rarely admit out loud‚Äîit‚Äôs entirely possible to hate the business you built. You‚Äôve likely heard that if you do what you love, you‚Äôll never work a day in your life. But what happens when what you love becomes a golden cage, locking you in with your own success? I've been in your shoes. I built an agency from the ground up, and after several detours, I found myself running a business I no longer enjoyed. Like you said, it was successful‚ÄîI was building for the market, solving a need, and getting rewarded for it. But solving for the market and what customers want isn‚Äôt always what you want. I spent years grinding it out, only to watch things worsen over time. If you keep trying to "suck it up and push through," as you mentioned, you'll eventually run the business into the ground. Burnout will set in, and even the simplest tasks will start to feel like massive chores. You'll procrastinate and avoid doing what you know is essential to keep the business moving forward. And when that happens, decline is inevitable. A business is either growing or dying‚Äîthere's no in-between. It might be a slow death, but it will happen if you keep pushing forward at this rate. That's exactly how I ran my business into the ground. I couldn't force myself to keep doing the work it required because, like you, the thought of continuing down that path for another year‚Äîlet alone a decade‚Äîmade me want to scream. The hard truth You owe nothing to the business you built. It doesn‚Äôt care about you; it‚Äôs an entity, a machine that runs on your time, energy, and passion. If that fuel is running low, it‚Äôs time to reassess. If a job were making you miserable, you'd quit, right? Yet, when it comes to our business, we trick ourselves into thinking we need to stay out of some misplaced sense of duty. But the reality is that staying in a business you hate is no different than staying in a toxic relationship. Sell it, hand it off, or burn it down Here‚Äôs the controversial part. It might be time to burn it all down. Sell the business, hand it off to someone who still has the passion, or even shut it down if that‚Äôs what it takes to reclaim your life. Or, pivot the business into something that excites you‚Äîsomething that energizes you and aligns with your values, contributing to a cause you find meaningful. That's exactly what I did. After sabotaging my own business and being stuck with the pieces, I decided to pivot. I began rebuilding slowly, offering different services and running things in a fun and exciting way again. The world won't end if you walk away. It might be the best decision you'll ever make. Imagine waking up tomorrow with a clean slate‚Äîa chance to start something new, something that excites you. That's not failure; that's evolution. Your business is supposed to serve your life, not the other way around. If it‚Äôs not serving you, it‚Äôs time to move on. You know how to build a successful business‚Äîyou‚Äôve proven it. Now, take those skills and start again. Create something new that excites you, something you‚Äôll look forward to in the next chapter of your career. How to move forward Now, I‚Äôm not saying go full scorched earth without a plan. Get your finances in order, talk to a business broker, and if you have employees, give them a soft landing. But don‚Äôt let guilt or societal expectations trap you in a life you‚Äôve outgrown. Once you have an exit strategy, focus on what you want to do next. Not sure where to start or what to do next? That's okay. Start by exploring and figuring out what really lights you up. Think about what you love spending time on in this new season of your life. Give yourself the space to dream a little. Ask yourself the big questions: What would your perfect workday look like now? What changes can you make to get closer to making that a reality? Which personal strengths would you like to use daily to run your business? Is there an intersection between what you love and what the world needs? If you were just given one million dollars to start your next business, what would that business be? What would your business offer to the world? What kind of people would your business serve? What kind of people would you hire? Start there and see where your answers lead. Moving forward is about reclaiming your passion and aligning your work with what truly matters to you. It‚Äôs not about having all the answers right away‚Äîit's about giving yourself permission to explore, dream, and redefine what success looks like for you. Start small, ask the big questions, and let those answers guide you toward your next chapter. Already have an account? [Sign in](/sign-in).

author: Daily Excelsior
title: Children exploring world of innovations at Natrang Camp
text:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, June 11: A new world of innovation and creativity is being explored by children at Natrang Summer Theatre Camp-2025 where a team of top professionals under the guidance of Padamshri Balwant Thakur are working with young children using latest approaches and techniques of personality transformation and human development.
The most noteworthy feature of this year‚Äôs camp is that it is being personally devised and monitored by Balwant Thakur himself.
This is the only professional platform for children in Jammu where children get an out of world exposure of creativity, art, aesthesis, innovation and culture.
Giving details of this initiative, Balwant Thakur informed that everywhere the work of creativity with children is being done as a fashion.
‚ÄúChildren in Natrang Theatre camp have found an amazing space where they are equipping themselves with multiple abilities and qualities,‚Äù he maintained adding: ‚ÄúTheatre is not only making them confident but is also enriching them with intellect and infusing in them the art of self-expression filled with immense social skills.‚Äù
The participants of Theatre Camp-2025 are Supria Gorka, Tanvi Bajgotra, Vamika Verma, Saanchi Dutta, Dwijesh Dutta, Ruhaan Chandan, Dhanak Chandan, Mahira Singh, Advik Sharma, Adhira Gupta, Reyansh Vaid, Adeesha Singh, Aashrita Sharma, Nirvana Shah, Jazz Shah, Akshaj Mehta, Anvay Mehta, Navda Prasher, Vanya Modi, Kayra Mahajan, Tanvi Mahajan, Raaga Sharma, Shravya Sharma, Aaliya Azeem, Kaustubh Sharma, Viyaan Sharma, Reeshak, Araiya Shan and Kamakhya Bali.

author: Esporte News Mundo
title: Cristiano Ronaldo alcan√ßa a incr√≠vel marca de 900 gols na carreira
text: Craque portugu√™s marcou um gol fundamental em sua carreira e alcan√ßou um feito in√©dito no futebol. Um dos maiores jogadores da hist√≥ria do futebol quebrou mais um recorde nesta quinta-feira (5). Cristiano Ronaldo marcou o segundo gol de Portugal na partida contra a Cro√°cia, v√°lida pela abertura da Liga das Na√ß√µes, e alcan√ßou um feito marcante. O craque portugu√™s se tornou o √∫nico atleta a chegar na marca de 900 gols oficiais na carreira. Na contagem da FIFA,o ranking ainda tem Lionel Messi com 838 gols, Josef Bican anotando 805 gols, Rom√°rio alcan√ßado 772 gols e Pel√© fechando a lista de l√≠deres com 767 gols marcados. Nesta lista, amistosos entre clubes e sele√ß√µes e outros jogos n√£o s√£o contabilizados. CR7 disputou 1238 jogos at√© marcar 900 gols. Dentro deste incr√≠vel n√∫mero, o gajo fez 575 gols com o p√© direito, 172 com o p√© esquerdo, 151 tentos de cabe√ßa e outros 2 gols com outras partes do corpo. Separando os gols pelo espa√ßo do campo em que foram marcados, Cristiano Ronaldo impressiona ainda mais. 604 dentro da √°rea, 164 em cobran√ßas de p√™nalti, 68 gols de fora da √°rea e 64 tentos marcados em cobran√ßas de falta. Olhando para os clubes, Ronaldo marcou 5 gols pelo Sporting, 145 gols pelo Manchester United, 450 tentos pelo Real Madrid, 101 pela Juventus e ainda 68 gols pelo Al Nassr. Por Portugal, Cristiano tem 131 gols marcados.

author: gqlshare
title: WNBA star Angel Reese makes cover of Sports Illustrated and Reese‚Äôs Puffs boxes nationwide
text:
WNBA All-Star and Randallstown native Angel Reese is making headlines in magazines and on cereal boxes.
Reese landed on the cover of Sports Illustrated‚Äôs Power List, which highlights the 50 most influential figures in all of sports. The second annual list published Wednesday spotlights athletes, icons and leaders, executives and influencers. The athletes category features a few from the WNBA, including Reese, fellow rookie Caitlin Clark and league Most Valuable Player A‚Äôja Wilson.
The WNBA‚Äôs golden age is just beginning. @Reese10Angel graces the cover of SI‚Äôs Power List issue, highlighting the 50 most influential figures in sports ü§©
üì∑: Taylor Ballantyne https://t.co/nYM68qzar3 pic.twitter.com/D5XIghMs0g
‚Äî Sports Illustrated (@SInow) September 18, 2024
The Chicago Sky rookie is also gearing up for a collaboration with Reese‚Äôs Puffs as the new face of limited-edition ‚ÄúAngel X Reese‚Äôs Puffs‚Äù cereal boxes, available by the end of October. The partnership includes four back-of-box designs, followed by an ‚Äúexciting collaboration later this year that continues to blend her creativity and passions for basketball and fashion,‚Äù General Mills said in a news release.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm so excited to partner with such an iconic brand. Not only does this fulfill my childhood dream of being on a cereal box, but there couldn‚Äôt be a better fit for me to join forces with than REESE‚ÄôS PUFFS cereal,‚Äù Reese said in a news release. ‚ÄúThis collaboration is such an honor, and I can‚Äôt wait for fans to get their hands on the cereal box and see what‚Äôs next in this partnership.‚Äù
Reese, 22, reportedly has endorsement deals worth several million, making more in endorsements than most WNBA players, according to Sarah Zipp, director of sports management at Mount St. Mary‚Äôs University.
Reese, along with other members of the WNBA‚Äôs rookie class, has helped bring the WNBA to new heights while landing bigger endorsement deals.
‚ÄúWe are seeing a trend of bigger endorsement deals for WNBA players and increased viewership for WNBA games,‚Äù Zipp said. ‚ÄúThose go hand in hand because greater visibility for players makes them more marketable for brands.‚Äù
Several factors contribute to the growth of the increased deals for WNBA players. Mainly, players like Reese and Clark were able to build their brand strategies before going professional because of the NCAA allowing name, image and likeness deals in college.
Reese was one of the biggest stars during her college years at LSU and she benefitted from NIL deals to the tune of nearly $2 million, Zipp said. Her success continued into the WNBA.
Clark is perhaps the most popular player in the WNBA, building on her record-shattering college career, according to Zipp. She has a $28 million deal with Nike and has contracts with other major brands like Gatorade, Wilson and State Farm, Zipp said.
‚ÄúOf course, they are both extraordinarily successful athletes, and their personas have further increased their fame and marketability,‚Äù Zipp said. ‚ÄúMany of these deals are rooted in her NIL days from college and she is breaking new ground for endorsements in the WNBA.‚Äù
There has been a feedback loop between sponsorship, viewership and media coverage, Zipp said. The longstanding argument has been that there isn‚Äôt a big fan base for women‚Äôs basketball, but according to Zipp, a lack of media coverage, funding and resources has been holding the sport back.
‚ÄúIf you can increase viewership, you can increase sponsorship funding. But if there is little media coverage, it‚Äôs difficult to build up viewership,‚Äù Zipp said. ‚ÄúNIL deals helped break that loop open so that players could go around media gatekeepers to build their fan base via social media and other marketing outlets. The popularity of players like Reese and Clark on the court and in the sport marketplace shows that there is a strong and loyal fan base.‚Äù
Based on this trend in women‚Äôs basketball and other examples such as Simone Biles, Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone and Katie Ledecky, opportunities might continue to grow for women in sports in the U.S. and around the globe, Zipp said.

author: GENTE
title: La lluvia amenaza a la Semana Santa
text:
La Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (Aemet) explica que las fechas en las que caen este a√±o los d√≠as festivos son muy inestables y que las probabilidades de que caigan precipitaciones son elevadas, sobre todo en determinadas zonas.
Archivado en:
[Semana Santa](/etiqueta/semana-santa/.), [tiempo](/etiqueta/tiempo/.), [turismo](/etiqueta/turismo/.), [meteorolog√≠a](/etiqueta/meteorologia/.)
La √∫ltima semana de marzo es habitualmente inestable
GENTE
22/3/2024 - 00:41
Hay pocas fechas en las que los espa√±oles miren m√°s el pron√≥stico meteorol√≥gico que antes de la Semana Santa, uno de los periodos m√°s impredecibles de todo el a√±o. Esa cuesti√≥n se agrava este a√±o al caer las jornadas festivas en el mes de marzo y no en abril, sobre todo en lo que tiene que ver con el fen√≥meno m√°s temido por los que tienen unos d√≠as libres: la lluvia. As√≠ lo asegura al menos la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a, que apunta a que entre el 24 de marzo y el 1 de abril existe hist√≥ricamente una gran "gran variabilidad clim√°tica", aunque eso no debe tomarse como una predicci√≥n para los pr√≥ximos d√≠as.
La Aemet apunta a que en esta √∫ltima semana de marzo las precipitaciones son "frecuentes". En la Pen√≠nsula, las provincias de Almer√≠a y Murcia suelen registrar entre 1 y 2 d√≠as de precipitaci√≥n. Le siguen el sur de Badajoz, Andaluc√≠a, interior de Murcia, Comunidad Valenciana, Albacete y zonas de Catalu√±a y Arag√≥n con entre 2 y 3 d√≠as. Gran parte del interior peninsular, como la Comunidad de Madrid, y Catalu√±a tienen entre 3 y 4 d√≠as de lluvia, mientras que norte de Castilla y Le√≥n, La Rioja, Navarra y sur de Cantabria se llevan entre 4 y 5. La zona con m√°s precipitaciones es la de Galicia, Asturias, norte de Cantabria y Pa√≠s Vasco, con entre 5 y 6 d√≠as de precipitaciones. En Baleares hay valores entre 2 y 4 d√≠as y en Canarias entre 1 y 2.
Un ejemplo de la variabilidad clim√°tica de estas fechas se refleja en la precipitaci√≥n acumulada en el Observatorio de Retiro en estos d√≠as. En ocho de los √∫ltimos 43 a√±os no ha habido lluvia y en cuatro m√°s ha sido igual o inferior a 1 l/m2; mientras que en 16 se han superado los 10, siendo los de mayor precipitaci√≥n 2004 con 49,6, 2003 con 39,3 y 2020 con 28,9.
BAJAS PRESIONES
Los que s√≠ se han atrevido a lanzar una primera predicci√≥n para la Semana Santa han sido los responsables de la p√°gina web eltiempo.es. Uno de sus expertos, Samuel Biener, apunta que los "d√≠as grandes" estar√°n marcados por "una situaci√≥n de bajas presiones rondando la Pen√≠nsula" que producir√° "un ambiente variable e inestable".
Aunque los "centros van a estar bastante m√≥viles por las ondulaciones del Chorro Polar", Biener se√±ala que el escenario m√°s probable por el momento es que las precipitaciones se concentren sobre todo en la vertiente cant√°brica. El portal ha avanzado que las temperaturas en Semana Santa ser√°n m√°s altas de lo habitual, sobre todo en la mitad este peninsular, sudeste, gran parte de Andaluc√≠a y ambos archipi√©lagos.
----------
|
|
El invierno m√°s c√°lido en Madrid:
La Comunidad de Madrid ha sufrido el invierno m√°s c√°lido desde que en 1961 empezaron a registrarse las temperaturas. As√≠ lo asegur√≥ el delegado de la Aemet en Madrid, Miguel √Ångel Pelacho, que indic√≥ que la media en este periodo ha sido de 7,4 grados, una anomal√≠a de 1,9 grados superior a la serie hist√≥rica.
-----

author: Dipl -Ing Martin Huber
title: Ossiach feiert Forst-Champions | Landwirtschaftskammer K√§rnten
text:
Ossiach feiert Forst-Champions
Am 13. Juli erlebten tausende Besucher einen unvergesslichen Sommertag in Ossiach, einer der kleinsten, aber wohl charmantesten Gemeinden K√§rntens. Hier gab es gleich zwei Highlights: die K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisterschaften sowie den traditionellen Holzstra√üenkirchtag.
G√ºnter Sonnleitner, Obmann der K√§rntner Holzstra√üe, und B√ºrgermeister Gernot Prinz luden in Kooperation mit der Carinthischen Musikakademie und der Forstlichen Ausbildungsst√§tte Ossiach zu einem eindrucksvollen Fest ein. Der 29. Holzstra√üenkirchtag bot ein abwechslungsreiches Programm und wurde von den G√§sten begeistert aufgenommen.
Den sportlichen H√∂hepunkt bildete die K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisterschaft mit insgesamt 71 Teilnehmerinnen und Teilnehmern aus vier Nationen ‚Äì ein eindrucksvoller Beweis f√ºr die Qualit√§t dieses Wettbewerbs. Bei strahlendem Sonnenschein konnten die Zuschauer den Athletinnen und Athleten bei spannenden Disziplinen wie Kettenwechsel, Fallkerb, Kombinationsschnitt, Blochrollen, Pr√§zisionsschnitt und Durchhacken hautnah zusehen.
G√ºnter Sonnleitner, Obmann der K√§rntner Holzstra√üe, und B√ºrgermeister Gernot Prinz luden in Kooperation mit der Carinthischen Musikakademie und der Forstlichen Ausbildungsst√§tte Ossiach zu einem eindrucksvollen Fest ein. Der 29. Holzstra√üenkirchtag bot ein abwechslungsreiches Programm und wurde von den G√§sten begeistert aufgenommen.
Den sportlichen H√∂hepunkt bildete die K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisterschaft mit insgesamt 71 Teilnehmerinnen und Teilnehmern aus vier Nationen ‚Äì ein eindrucksvoller Beweis f√ºr die Qualit√§t dieses Wettbewerbs. Bei strahlendem Sonnenschein konnten die Zuschauer den Athletinnen und Athleten bei spannenden Disziplinen wie Kettenwechsel, Fallkerb, Kombinationsschnitt, Blochrollen, Pr√§zisionsschnitt und Durchhacken hautnah zusehen.
Packendes Finale
Besonders dramatisch wurde es im Finale der M√§nnerklasse: Die drei besten Teilnehmer traten ‚Äì wie bei einem Parallelslalom ‚Äì zeitgleich gegeneinander an. Da die Punkte aus den Vorrunden nicht z√§hlten, entschied einzig die Leistung im Finaldurchgang √ºber die Platzierung. Nervenstark setzte sich J√ºrgen Erlacher durch: Mit fehlerfreien Schnitten an 30 √Ñsten und einer beeindruckenden Zeit von 15,2 Sekunden sicherte er sich den Titel des K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisters. Platz zwei und drei gingen an Michael Ramsbacher und Martin Wei√ü.
Besonders dramatisch wurde es im Finale der M√§nnerklasse: Die drei besten Teilnehmer traten ‚Äì wie bei einem Parallelslalom ‚Äì zeitgleich gegeneinander an. Da die Punkte aus den Vorrunden nicht z√§hlten, entschied einzig die Leistung im Finaldurchgang √ºber die Platzierung. Nervenstark setzte sich J√ºrgen Erlacher durch: Mit fehlerfreien Schnitten an 30 √Ñsten und einer beeindruckenden Zeit von 15,2 Sekunden sicherte er sich den Titel des K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisters. Platz zwei und drei gingen an Michael Ramsbacher und Martin Wei√ü.
In der Damenwertung holte sich Katharina Oschounig den Sieg ‚Äì noch vor der amtierenden Weltmeisterin Carina Modl und Caroline Weinberger.
Als bestes Team wurde der Forstbetrieb Foscari ‚Äì Drautalforst mit den Schneidern Wolfram Pilgram-Huber, J√ºrgen Erlacher und Daniel Oberrauner ausgezeichnet ‚Äì vor den beiden Teams vom Waldsport Litzl-hof. Die G√§steklasse entschied Christian Rinnhofer aus der Steiermark f√ºr sich.
Besonders dramatisch wurde es im Finale der M√§nnerklasse: Die drei besten Teilnehmer traten ‚Äì wie bei einem Parallelslalom ‚Äì zeitgleich gegeneinander an. Da die Punkte aus den Vorrunden nicht z√§hlten, entschied einzig die Leistung im Finaldurchgang √ºber die Platzierung. Nervenstark setzte sich J√ºrgen Erlacher durch: Mit fehlerfreien Schnitten an 30 √Ñsten und einer beeindruckenden Zeit von 15,2 Sekunden sicherte er sich den Titel des K√§rntner Waldarbeitsmeisters. Platz zwei und drei gingen an Michael Ramsbacher und Martin Wei√ü.
In der Damenwertung holte sich Katharina Oschounig den Sieg ‚Äì noch vor der amtierenden Weltmeisterin Carina Modl und Caroline Weinberger.
Als bestes Team wurde der Forstbetrieb Foscari ‚Äì Drautalforst mit den Schneidern Wolfram Pilgram-Huber, J√ºrgen Erlacher und Daniel Oberrauner ausgezeichnet ‚Äì vor den beiden Teams vom Waldsport Litzl-hof. Die G√§steklasse entschied Christian Rinnhofer aus der Steiermark f√ºr sich.
Feierlicher Ausklang
Bei der abendlichen Siegerehrung im bis zuletzt gut besuchten Festzelt wurden alle Teilnehmerinnen und Teilnehmer f√ºr ihre Leistungen geb√ºhrend geehrt. Dank zahlreicher Sponsoren gab es hochwertige Preise zu gewinnen ‚Äì niemand ging leer aus.
Ein besonderer Dank gilt dem Organisationsteam rund um Anna-Sophie Pirtscher, Leiterin der Forstlichen Ausbildungsst√§tte Ossiach sowie der Gemeinde Ossiach, dem Verein K√§rntner Holzstra√üe ‚Äì Region Nockberge, der Landjugend, der Landarbeiterkammer, der LK K√§rnten und dem Waldsportverein Litzlhof. SVS-Moderator Johannes Kr√∂pfl begleitete den Tag mit fachkundiger Moderation und vermittelte den G√§sten das wichtige Thema Arbeitssicherheit in der Forstwirtschaft. F√ºr einen fairen und regelkonformen Ablauf sorgte Oberschiedsrichter Armin Graf.
Nicht zuletzt geb√ºhrt auch den zahlreichen Schiedsrichtern, Schreibern, Helfern und gro√üz√ºgigen Sponsoren ein herzliches Dankesch√∂n. Ein besonderer Dank gilt Hasslacher Norica Timber, die als Hauptsponsor das gesamte Wettkampfholz bereitstellte.
Ein Festtag, der begeistert hat ‚Äì und lange in Erinnerung bleiben wird.

author: Get News
title: At Home Nursing Care Continues to Provide Exceptional Home Health Care in San Diego | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
At Home Nursing Care, led by Lauren Reynolds, pledges continued excellence in Home Health Care for San Diego, CA. Specializing in personalized services, they ensure dignity, comfort, and professional care for every client. A trusted name in San Diego Home Care, they're dedicated to enhancing lives with compassion and quality. For more details, Google it at https://athomenursingcare.com San Diego, CA - At Home Nursing Care, under the leadership of Lauren Reynolds, today reaffirms its commitment to the San Diego community by continuing to offer superior Home Health Care services. Understanding the increasing need for reliable home care, At Home Nursing Care is devoted to ensuring that families in San Diego have access to the compassionate, professional care their loved ones deserve.
"Providing high-quality Home Health Care in San Diego is more than a service; it's a commitment to enhancing the lives of those in our care," said Lauren Reynolds. "At At Home Nursing Care, we recognize the importance of accessible, quality care that meets the diverse needs of our community. We're dedicated to delivering San Diego Home Care that ensures our clients' well-being, comfort, and dignity."
At Home Nursing Care specializes in a broad spectrum of home health services tailored to each client's needs. From skilled nursing and therapeutic services to assistance with daily living activities and palliative care, At Home Nursing Care's team of experienced healthcare professionals is committed to providing the highest level of care. This dedication to excellence and personalized attention sets At Home Nursing Care apart as a leading provider of Home Health Care in San Diego.
The demand for comprehensive and dependable home care services in San Diego highlights the community's trust in At Home Nursing Care as a premier provider. By prioritizing its clients' health and happiness through innovative care solutions and a commitment to excellence, At Home Nursing Care strengthens its position as a trusted partner for families throughout San Diego, CA.
For more information about At Home Nursing Care and their home health care in San Diego , please visit their website at https://athomenursingcare.com
About At Home Nursing Care:
At Home Nursing Care is a premier provider of Home Health Care and San Diego Home Care services. Founded by Lauren Reynolds, the agency is known for its commitment to quality, compassion, and innovation in home health care. Offering a wide range of personalized health care services, At Home Nursing Care is dedicated to improving the lives of seniors and individuals with health challenges in San Diego, CA. With a focus on dignity, independence, and well-being, At Home Nursing Care remains a trusted choice for families seeking the best in home health care.
